about_me.title: about me
about_me.summary: I am a programmer who is enthusiastic about learning new skills and technologies in the field of programming. My programming career began with entering university and learning languages like C and C++. Subsequently, due to my interest in programming, I started learning Python. The unique features of Python increased my interest in this language, and since then, I have been striving to deepen my knowledge in this area.

projects.title: Shift Supervisor
projects.description: This project is part of a PDMS (Plant Design Management System), designed for managing and analyzing daily data in an industrial environment. In this system, users with different access levels can enter their daily information related to their respective sections, while admins can generate various daily, monthly, and production reports.

projects.title: Shirino Hotel
projects.description: This project is a food reservation system for employees, allowing them to order food on specific days for themselves and their families. The priority system is automated or can be managed by the employer, with prioritized employees receiving SMS notifications to collect their meals.

projects.title: Tavana
projects.description: This project is a board management system that allows users to define pins and send or receive data on each pin. Using Django and Celery, tasks can be scheduled to run automatically at specified times. Docker is used for deployment, and RabbitMQ is used for message management, ensuring scalable and automated operations.
